app.title: 3D PaintVoxel Canvas - Three.js
app.description: Paint in 3D space with custom colors

colorPicker.title: Pick a Color
colorPicker.replaceLabel: Click a color to replace it

notifications.maxColorsReached: Maximum of 20 colors reached. Use Replace mode instead.
notifications.selectColorToReplace: Please select a color to replace
notifications.artworkCleared: Artwork will be cleared when changing grid size
notifications.gridSizeError: Grid size must be between 4 and 128
notifications.enterDescription: Please enter a description for your art
notifications.configureAPIKey: Please configure your Gemini API key in main.js
notifications.dimensionsError: Grid dimensions must be between 4 and 128
notifications.voxelSizeError: Voxel dimensions must be between 4 and 64
notifications.cannotRemoveLastCube: Cannot remove the last cube! At least one cube must remain.
notifications.addModeTip: Add Mode: Right-click to place cubes, Left-click to remove
notifications.paintModeTip: Paint Mode: Click on cubes to paint them
notifications.aiURLRequired: AIエンドポイントURLを入力してください
notifications.aiConfigSaved: AI設定が正常に保存されました！ ✨
notifications.configureCustomAI: 設定でカスタムAIエンドポイントを設定してください

export.title: Export Artwork
export.3dInfo: 💡 Export your voxel art as a 3D model file that can be used in other 3D software, game engines, or 3D printing.
export.glbInfo: • GLB: Best for game engines (Unity, Unreal)

settings.title: Settings
settings.gridSizeHelp: Changes the number of pixels in your canvas
settings.gridWarning: ⚠️ Warning: Changing grid size will clear your artwork!
settings.warning: Warning: Changing grid size will clear your artwork!
settings.aiConfigurationHelp: カスタムまたはローカルモデル用のAI生成エンドポイントを設定
settings.customAIInfo: 💡 独自のAIエンドポイントを設定（ローカルモデルにはAPIキーは不要）
settings.aiAPIKeyPlaceholder: ローカルモデルの場合は空のまま
settings.startAgainHelp: 現在の作品をクリアして新しいキャンバスで始める
settings.startAgainConfirm: 本当に最初からやり直しますか？現在のすべての作品がクリアされ、新しいセッションが作成されます。

aiPrompt.title: AI Generate Art
aiPrompt.promptLabel: Describe what you want to create
aiPrompt.promptPlaceholder: A cute pixel art cat with blue eyes...
aiPrompt.info: ⚠️ AI will create art based on your settings and color palette.
aiPrompt.gridTip: 💡 Recommended sizes: 8x8 to 32x32 for best results

startup.title: 3D Voxel Art Studio
startup.chooseCanvas: Choose your canvas to start creating
startup.singleCubeDesc: Start with one cube and build your 3D masterpiece
startup.gridCanvasDesc: Start with a flat grid for pixel art
startup.tip: 💡 Tip: Use Paint Mode to color cubes and Add Mode to place new cubes in 3D space!

cookies.title: 🍪 We Use Cookies
cookies.message: We use localStorage to save your session, artwork, and preferences. This helps us provide you with a better experience. By continuing, you agree to our use of local storage.
cookies.note: Note: Basic functionality requires localStorage for session management.

loading.title: Loading Session...
loading.message: Please wait while we restore your artwork
